div.bibl: Lietuva, Vol. II, No. 30, June 28, 1894THE LITHUANIAN MUSICIANS OF CHICAGO

body.p: The Lithuanian musicians held their meeting Sunday, July 22, in a church hall, where they organized the Lithuanian Musicians' Society of Chicago. Later on the Musicians' Society will join the Simonas Daukantas Society.
The following members joined to this society:
There are many more Lithuanians in Chicago. Come and join our organization. We must have as many as forty or more musicians in our society.
Even if your are not a very good player, come and join us. We will teach you how to play. It is not hard to learn to play well.
